issue.title: Thread names in logs and deadlock debug tools (take 2)
issue.body:
Replaces #13099.

The goal here is the same as the previous PR, but this approach only includes threadnames in logs when we can make use of `thread_local`. We specifically disable `HAVE_THREAD_LOCAL` for platforms where its presence or implementation is questionable (Darwin, mingw32).

Instead of using a mutex-protected map to generate numeric suffixes (e.g. `httpworker.2`) we explicitly pass in suffixes during thread creation.

Under this changeset, logs look like this:
```
2018-06-13T21:43:28Z [bitcoin-qt-init] init message: Starting network threads...
2018-06-13T21:43:28Z [net] net thread start
2018-06-13T21:43:28Z [bitcoin-qt-init] init message: Done loading
2018-06-13T21:43:28Z [opencon] opencon thread start
2018-06-13T21:43:28Z [msghand] msghand thread start
2018-06-13T21:43:28Z [dnsseed] dnsseed thread start
2018-06-13T21:43:28Z [dnsseed] Loading addresses from DNS seeds (could take a while)
2018-06-13T21:43:28Z [dnsseed] 0 addresses found from DNS seeds
2018-06-13T21:43:28Z [dnsseed] dnsseed thread exit
2018-06-13T21:43:28Z [addcon] addcon thread start
2018-06-13T21:43:28Z [bitcoin-qt] GUI: Platform customization: "other"
2018-06-13T21:43:28Z [bitcoin-qt] GUI: PaymentServer::LoadRootCAs: Loaded  146  root certificates
2018-06-13T21:43:28Z [loadblk] Loaded 1 blocks from external file in 147ms
2018-06-13T21:43:28Z [loadblk] Reindexing finished
2018-06-13T21:43:28Z [loadblk] Imported mempool transactions from disk: 0 succeeded, 0 failed, 0 expired, 0 already there

```

issue.title: commits from bitcoin/master

[gui] Add proxy icon in statusbar
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11491

Fix some concurrency issues in ActivateBestChain()
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13023

[wallet] `loadwallet` RPC - load wallet at runtime
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/10740

GUI: Rephrase Bech32 checkbox texts, and enable it with legacy address default
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13251

break circular dependency: random/sync -> util -> random/sync
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13236

issue.title: Fix FreeBSD build by including utilstrencodings.h
issue.body:
`random.cpp` needs to explicitly include `utilstrencodings.h` to get `ARRAYLEN`. This fixes the FreeBSD build.

This was broken in 84f41946b9026e8bf7bc44ed848dfb945394b693 (#13236).

issue.title: [Refactor] Update RNG code from upstream
issue.body:
This is a collection of upstream PRs that have been backported to bring our RNG (`src/random`) code more up-to-date. The following upstream PRs have been included here:

- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12742
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14624 
  - some of this had already been merged previously
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14955
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15250
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15224
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15324
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15296
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15512
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/16878
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17151
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17191
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13236
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13314
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17169
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17270
  -  omitted last commit as our testing framework doesn't support it currently
  - omitted https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17270/commits/64e1e022cedf6776c5dffd488ca2e766adca5dc3, to be pulled in after our time utility is updated in a separate PR
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17573
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17507
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17670
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17527
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14127
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21486

issue.title: Sync backports
issue.body:
Cherry-picked from the following upstream PRs:
- bitcoin/bitcoin#8392
  - We cherry-picked the second commit in zcash/zcash#2812.
- bitcoin/bitcoin#9535
- bitcoin/bitcoin#9674
- bitcoin/bitcoin#9987
  - Excluding code that is still in use for us.
- bitcoin/bitcoin#11432
- bitcoin/bitcoin#10866
  - Excluding the third commit (we don't have the code it alters).
- bitcoin/bitcoin#11722
- bitcoin/bitcoin#12283
  - Only the typos we currently have.
- bitcoin/bitcoin#12367
  - Only the first commit, which fixes a bug in bitcoin/bitcoin#8392.
- bitcoin/bitcoin#12891
  - Only the first commit (the linter is useless for our logging system).
- bitcoin/bitcoin#13236
- bitcoin/bitcoin#13300
- bitcoin/bitcoin#13423
  - Only the first commit (second commit blocks on net processing refactors).
- bitcoin/bitcoin#11640
- bitcoin/bitcoin#11599
- bitcoin/bitcoin#14963
  - Only the first and third commits.

comments.diff_hunk:

 #include <compat.h> // for Windows API
 #include <wincrypt.h>
 #endif
-#include <util.h>             // for LogPrint()
-#include <utilstrencodings.h> // for GetTime()
+#include <logging.h>          // for LogPrint()
+#include <utiltime.h>         // for GetTime()
